TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1493
TEI.2.document_title: Robert Desha to Stephen F. Austin, 11-06-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Robert Desha to Austin, November 6, 1826. Introducing B. F. Foster.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1493

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Robert Desha to Austin, November 6, 1826. Introducing B. F. Foster.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Dear ser.*/p*
*p*My friend *person_mentioned*Col. Benjamin F Fauster*/person_mentioned* will hand you this;*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Col*/person_mentioned*. is the *person_mentioned*agent for the Texas Association Company*/person_mentioned* and will reside in that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*You will find him an intelligent Gentlemanly *person_mentioned*man*/person_mentioned*, and one in whom you will be pleased on an acquaintance—any services you can render him whilst in your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*will be acknowledged etc.—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Robt Desha*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Austins Grant Texas Pr. */location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col. Fauster*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
